overview: When a hotelier attempts to fill the chronic vacancies at his castle by launching an advertising campaign that falsely portrays the property as haunted, two actual ghosts show up and end up falling for two guests.
tagline: He's an American. She's a ghost. Vacation romances are always a hassle.
cast: Peter O'Toole|Daryl Hannah|Steve Guttenberg|Beverly D'Angelo|Jennifer Tilly
